text: Choose the correct article: ___ orange is on the table.
How do you spell the number 7?
Which of these is a color?
Choose the correct article: ___ cat is black.
Which word is a day of the week?
How do you spell the number 10?
Choose the past simple form of 'go'.
He ___ swim when he was five.
Choose an indefinite pronoun for something.
By this time tomorrow, she ___ the exam.
The man ___ lives next door is a doctor.
There are ___ people in the room.
He said he ___ the next day.
If I ___ enough money, I'd buy a car.
The film was ___ interesting than I expected.
___ I had the key, I opened the door.
Neither my brother ___ my sister likes sushi.
If I had known, I ___ have come.
She likes swimming, and so ___ I.
The book, ___ was published in 1920, is out of print.
I will ___ my hair cut tomorrow.
Had I known about the traffic, I ___ earlier.
No sooner had he arrived ___ it started raining.
It's high time you ___ to bed.
The documents will be sent tomorrow.

options.text: Tomorrow will be sent the documents.
The documents will be sent tomorrow.

text: If she ___ harder, she would have passed.
Hardly ____ the show begun when the lights went out.
The manager demanded that the report ___ immediately.
Neither the teachers nor the student ___ aware of the change.
The film was ___ to be true.
Not only ___ late, but he also forgot the tickets.
He speaks English ___ than I do.
The book is thought ___ by Shakespeare.
She said she would finish it by Monday, ___ she?
It was the first time I ___ sushi.
Let's ___ the meeting until next week.
Hard work is the key ___ success.
What you said is a case ___ point.
Had it not ___ for your help, I would have failed.
He was ill; ___, he went to work.
